he: דְּשָׁלְקִי לֵיהּ שִׁבְעָא זִימְנֵי, וְאִי לָא שָׁקְלִי לֵיהּ מַסְרַח — וְכִפְסוֹלֶת מִתּוֹךְ אוֹכֶל דָּמֵי.
text: as they are boiled seven times. And, if one does not remove them from the shells, they rot. Therefore, it is considered like removing waste from food. The rotting edible portion of the lupine causes the shell to reek. Removing the edible portion, therefore, has the legal status of removing waste.
